pageContext.claim: “I just saw a poll came out in USA Today yesterday where I'm beating every candidate by a lot....it was me against their top candidates on the other side.”
pageContext.analysis: A poll from USA Today and Suffolk University released Dec. 17 showed Trump beating every major Democrat by between three and 10 points. But these were not head-to-head matchups. In each case, a generic third-party candidate garnered support in the double digits. Other reputable polls that do not include a third-party option show that several leading Democrats would defeat Trump.
